item.title: Stop Spending Too Much Money on Technology
item.description: Many people feel the need to spend a lot of money on technology. They think that because technology is complex and vast, they should buy from the most expensive brands. I think that the opposite is true. Because technology is complex and vast, we should buy cheap but great tech products. Most importantly, we should buy technology that we actually understand. Ultra-complex technology takes advantage of everyone who uses it because no one can understand it. This is why we should only use technology that is simple and easy to understand. You can get by spending one quarter of what most people spend.
